higher_highs.title: The Rising Smoke Signals
higher_highs.narrative: Smoke rises from the trading post, each signal higher than the last. What do the spirits tell you?
higher_highs.correct: A strong caravan is forming - the trend will continue upward
wrongs: These are just scouts - the real move is downward
The spirits are unclear - I should wait

lower_lows.title: Footprints Into the Swamp
lower_lows.narrative: Each step sinks deeper than the last. The path grows darker. What does it mean?
lower_lows.correct: Weakness grows - the trend is likely to continue downward
wrongs: Strength returns - I should buy now

consolidation.title: The Silent Clearing
consolidation.narrative: The jungle falls quiet. No tribe advances. What do you do?
consolidation.correct: Wait for a clear break - the village must not waste Semangat
wrongs: Strike blindly - action is always best
Double size - force the spirits to obey
